dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Back in 2018, Canelo Alvarez just signed a deal with ESPN worth a minimum of $365 million.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Back in twenty eighteen, Canelo Alvarez just signed a deal with E S P N worth a minimum of three hundred sixty five dollars million.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The deal is worth a minimum of $365 million, an average of $33 million per fight, according to his promoter Golden Boy Promotions. Alvarez will kick off his DAZN deal December 15 at Madison Square Garden against Rocky Fielding, and then likely fight again in early May for a Cinco de Mayo match.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, that's an average of like, what, $33 million per fight? That's absolutely wild.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, that's an average of like, what, thirty three dollars million per fight? That's absolutely wild.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The deal is worth a minimum of $365 million, an average of $33 million per fight, according to his promoter Golden Boy Promotions.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And he kicks it off December 15th at Madison Square Garden against Rocky Fielding. Then probably another fight in May for Cinco de Mayo.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And he kicks it off December fifteenth at Madison Square Garden against Rocky Fielding. Then probably another fight in May for Cinco de Mayo.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Alvarez will kick off his DAZN deal December 15 at Madison Square Garden against Rocky Fielding, and then likely fight again in early May for a Cinco de Mayo match.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: So with those two ESPN fights, plus the $75 million from the Golovkin rematch last month… he could bank over $150 million in a year.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So with those two E S P N fights, plus the seventy five dollars million from the Golovkin rematch last month... he could bank over one hundred fifty dollars million in a year.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: With the two DAZN fights, plus roughly $50 million for his razor-thin win over Gennady Golovkin last month and several million dollars from endorsements, Alvarez should bank at least $120 million over the 12 months.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Which puts him in the running to be Forbes' highest-paid athlete next year. That's huge.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which puts him in the running to be Forbes' highest-paid athlete next year. That's huge.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Mexican boxer has a strong chance to rank as the worlds highest-paid athlete next year in Forbes annual look at the top stars in sports.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And if he schedules a third fight with GGG in May? His earnings would just skyrocket even more.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And if he schedules a third fight with G G G in May? His earnings would just skyrocket even more.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Scheduling Golovkin as his opponent in May, which would be his third fight with GGG, would goose Alvarez's earnings even more.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It's interesting though—HBO was his home for years, but they just announced they're dropping boxing coverage.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's interesting though-H B O was his home for years, but they just announced they're dropping boxing coverage.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: HBO was the former home for Alvarez, who ranks as the biggest pay-per-view star in the sport after the retirement of Floyd Mayweather. But HBO announced last month that it would end its coverage of boxing at the end of 2018.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, after more than four decades setting the standard. End of an era, honestly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, after more than four decades setting the standard. End of an era, honestly.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The premium cable network had set the standard for televising the sport for more than four decades, and its pay-per-view arm featured many of boxing's biggest stars, including Sugar Ray Leonard, Evander Holyfield, Oscar De La Hoya, Manny Pacquiao, Floyd Mayweather and dozens more.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: So now ESPN snags him. But DAZN is also making big moves—they signed that billion-dollar deal with Matchroom Boxing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So now E S P N snags him. But D A Z N is also making big moves-they signed that billion-dollar deal with Matchroom Boxing.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The boxing world has been buzzing over Canelos next landing spot, with Showtime, ESPN and Turner all having been viewed as contenders. It signed an eight-year, $1 billion deal in May with Eddie Hearns Matchroom Boxing, home of heavyweight champion Anthony Joshua.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right, Eddie Hearn's group. Heavyweight champ Anthony Joshua is with them too. The streaming wars are heating up in boxing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, Eddie Hearn's group. Heavyweight champ Anthony Joshua is with them too. The streaming wars are heating up in boxing.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It signed an eight-year, $1 billion deal in May with Eddie Hearns Matchroom Boxing, home of heavyweight champion Anthony Joshua.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Canelo's deal actually tops some massive contracts in other sports too—like Giancarlo Stanton's $325 million with the Yankees.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Canelo's deal actually tops some massive contracts in other sports too-like Giancarlo Stanton's three hundred twenty five dollars million with the Yankees.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Alvarez deal tops the 13-year, $325 million playing contract for New York Yankees slugger Giancarlo Stanton.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And it's on par with global soccer stars. Messi and Neymar both have deals around $350 million.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And it's on par with global soccer stars. Messi and Neymar both have deals around three hundred fifty dollars million.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Global soccer icons Neymar and Lionel Messi both have deals worth roughly $350 million, with Neymars a five-year contract and Messis haul spread over four years.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Messi might be his biggest competition for that top earner spot. He was second this year at $111 million.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Messi might be his biggest competition for that top earner spot. He was second this year at one hundred eleven dollars million.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Messi will likely be Alvarezs biggest competition for the title of worlds highest-paid athlete. He ranked second on this year's list at $111 million, behind only Mayweather.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: But with this new ESPN money, plus endorsements… Canelo's got a real shot at number one.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But with this new E S P N money, plus endorsements... Canelo's got a real shot at number one.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Alvarez will kick off his DAZN deal December 15 at Madison Square Garden against Rocky Fielding, and then likely fight again in early May for a Cinco de Mayo match. The Mexican boxer has a strong chance to rank as the worlds highest-paid athlete next year in Forbes annual look at the top stars in sports.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: He said this deal will push him to prepare even more and give fans better performances. You love to hear that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He said this deal will push him to prepare even more and give fans better performances. You love to hear that.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Being part of this historic deal will require me to prepare myself even more and offer fans even better performances, Alvarez said in a release announcing the deal.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. Boxing's are definitely winning with all these big money moves right now.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. Boxing's are definitely winning with all these big money moves right now.
